products.title: Luna Blackout Navy - Silver Frame Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Luna blackout navy - silver frame velux keylite fakro dakstra in blue. Made to measure from 19.00 with free uk mainland delivery. This velux keylite fakro dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their luna blackout roof blinds come in 8 colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework. 
 
This fabric has an acrylic coating backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.
 
 Product id: db-srb0046 fabric colour: navy material: 100% polyester lining: acrylic coated white backing headrail: 53mm deep cassette & 30mm wide side channels   energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Skye Aruba Blue (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure skye aruba blue (blackout) velux windows 1992-2001 from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux windows 1992-2001 online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Infusion Solar Pale Blue Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Infusion solar pale blue pleated skylight blind in blue. Made to measure from 40.94 with free uk mainland delivery. This pleated skylight blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. 
 The infusion solar pale blue pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. 
 
 Product id: db-pls0021 fabric colour: pale blue headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.   Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.metadescription: Buy made to measure blue (1156) velux energy blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux energy blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:

The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.
